title: Apple releases feature updates to Pages, Keynote, and Numbers with productivity improvements and more
content:
Six months after the last update on the iWork suite, Apple is releasing a new version of Pages, Numbers, and Keynote to iPhone, iPad, and Mac users. Here’s everything you need to know about version 12.0.

more…

The post Apple releases feature updates to Pages, Keynote, and Numbers with productivity improvements and more appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Six months after the last update on the iWork suite, Apple is releasing a new version of Pages, Numbers, and Keynote to all users.
